players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie is the detective and I'm not sure if he's going to investigate me or Diana."
Diana: "Charlie is the detective and I'm not sure if he's going to investigate me or Diana because Bob said so."
Charlie: "Bob is trying to mislead us about who he thinks I'll investigate."
Diana: remained silent.
You: remained silent.
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso and I'm going to investigate Diana."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Charlie was arrested

You: "Bob is trying to mislead us about who he thinks I'll investigate."

Bob: remained silent.
You: "Bob is the mafioso and I'm going to investigate Diana."
